TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyFilterAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PropertyFilterAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PropertyFilterAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> supports an internal mechanism that limits the number of properties on a type that are returned by the custom <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> type descriptor. If the attribute is found, the type descriptor narrows the scope of returned properties. <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> differs from typical attributes because you cannot apply it to a class as metadata. The filter mechanism works through code instead of through static metadata.

Docs.param: The object to compare to this .
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
Docs.returns: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation compares the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> values on each <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> for value equality. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> are the same, then the two <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> instances are equal.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Filter As PropertyFilterOptions

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the filter options for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A> is the same value as was provided for the `filter` constructor argument when this <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> was constructed. There is no other means of setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A> value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Match(object value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Match (value As Object) As Boolean

Docs.param: The object to compare. This object is expected to be a .
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the property filter options of the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] match the property filter options of the provided object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For attributes that store flags, which is true for <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Match%2A> result may be different from an <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> result. For example, a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.SetValues> matches a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All>, because <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All> is a merge of all filter values.
